Description: Due to the number of individuals requesting me to offer shipping I am offering to ship. The flat rate cost is due to professional packaging and preparation by ups as well as full value insurance. It isnt inexpensive but it is worth it to ensure the instrument is shipped with buyer confidence. You are bidding on an excellent condition 2014 Gibson Flying V120 Annaversary in Classic White. Looks amazing due to the natural aging of the lacqer and will only continue to get better! I purchased this beauty new from Wildwoods in Colorado. It plays and sounds amazing! The only reason I am selling is because I am in a country band now and I don't get to use it due to the style of music we play. There are No scratches or dings and it has absolutely 100% fret life! There are zero fret buzzes due to the factory plek job and the action can go as low as you would ever want it. The Flying V 120 takes off with a select mahogany body cut to the legendary space-aged angles of the original. The glued-in mahogany neck is carved to the fast, slim profile that so many rockers love, with a bound one-piece Grade-A rosewood fingerboard with frets over binding and dot inlays. The traditional “arrowhead” headstock has a white plastic truss-rod cover with Gibson logo, and there’s a commemorative “120th Anniversary” banner at the 12th fret. Vintage tones with contemporary performance come from Alnico V Burst Bucker Pro Rhythm and Lead pickups, made in the image of the original PAF humbuckers with mismatched coils for characteristic bite and depth. A chrome Tune-o-matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece partner with Grover™ Kidney Button tuners for smooth, efficient performance. The Flying V 120 comes finished in high-gloss nitrocellulose lacquer, all protected by an elegant brown hardshell case.
Title: Gibson Flying V 120th Anniversary Classic White (only 120 made!)
ConditionDescription: Excellent condition! Classic White Awsome sound and playability! Absolutely no dings or scratches!  I purchased this guitar new from Wildwoods in Colorado.
